Header

The cached header contained the following items (this is before WWWOFFLE has modified it and possibly censored some items). 

%html[head1]
The header that would be sent to the browser by WWWOFFLE would contain the following items. 

%html[head2]

Contents

The contents of the page that WWWOFFLE might be interested in like links, images, stylesheets and other things.

Source

The HTML source code for the cached page (without any WWWOFFLE modifications).

Request Headers

The headers that the browser would send to WWWOFFLE if it was to request this page.

This link will ask the browser to visit the URL and WWWOFFLE will capture that request.
If the browser displays its own cached version of the page you will not see the headers sent to WWWOFFLE.
